mapper.select: SELECT * FROM groups WHERE scaling_status NOT IN ("DONE", "CANCELED", "BLOCKED")
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groups (name, service_id, environment_id, scaling_factor, json_params) VALUES (#{name}, #{serviceId}, #{environmentId}, #{scalingFactor}, #{jsonParams})
mapper.update: UPDATE groups SET name=#{name}, service_id=#{serviceId}, environment_id=#{environmentId}, scaling_factor=#{scalingFactor}, scaling_status=#{scalingStatus}, json_params=#{jsonParams} WHERE id=#{id}
